Package com.dabdm.travelplan

Class Summary
BuildConfig  
CopyOfItinerariesActivity An activity where you can choose one of the existing itineraries or create a new one
DestinationActivity This activity allows the user to set up the configuration of its project : => Choose the name of the project => Type the adress of the place he will stay => Type the radius he's interested in (the radius will determine how far the user is willing to go to visit places) => Type the trip duration
DownloadActivity  
DownloadActivity.dlEndDialogFragment Class for the dialog used to inform the player about the end of the download
FtpHelper This class is a helper that provides functionalities to get and store a file on the TravelPlan server
ItinerariesActivity An activity where you can choose one of the existing itineraries or create a new one
MainActivity  
Manifest  
Manifest.permission  
PlacesActivity Activity showing a list of the places given by the API GooglePlace
R  
R.array  
R.attr  
R.color  
R.drawable  
R.id  
R.layout  
R.menu  
R.string  
R.style  
R.styleable  
R.xml  
StorageHelper Class used to store static methods that store and fetch objects in the internal memory of the device
Travel Class representing one of the user's travel Contains data about the places to visit and the calculated itineraries
